MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW8 postcode area of Northwich affecting properties in Whitley Avenue, Emmett Street and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:39am. Restoration is taking longer than expected because of further investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:27pm on 14th January 2021.
